org.netbeans.spi.io.support

Class Hyperlinks

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.spi.io.support.Hyperlinks

  • public final class Hyperlinks
extends Object
    Helper class for accessing information from Hyperlink objects.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        @NonNull
public static HyperlinkType getType(@NonNull
                                             Hyperlink hyperlink)
        Get hyperlink type.
        Parameters:
        hyperlink - The hyperlink to get type of.
        Returns:
        The type of the hyperlink.

      • isImportant

        public static boolean isImportant(@NonNull
                                  Hyperlink hyperlink)
        Check whether a hyperlink is important.

        Important hyperlinks can be printed in different color, or can have some special behavior, e.g. automatic scrolling can be switched off to keep the important hyperlink visible.

        Parameters:
        hyperlink - The hyperlink to check.
        Returns:
        True if the hyperlink has been marked as important, false if it is a standard link.

      • getRunnable

        @NonNull
public static Runnable getRunnable(@NonNull
                                            Hyperlink hyperlink)
        Get runnable associated with a hyperlink of type HyperlinkType.FROM_RUNNABLE.
        Parameters:
        hyperlink - The hyperlink to get runnable from.
        Returns:
        A runnable.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if type of the hyperlink is not HyperlinkType.FROM_RUNNABLE.
        See Also:
        getType(org.netbeans.api.io.Hyperlink), HyperlinkType

      • getIntent

        @NonNull
public static Intent getIntent(@NonNull
                                        Hyperlink hyperlink)
        Get intent associated with a hyperlink of type HyperlinkType.FROM_INTENT.
        Parameters:
        hyperlink - The hyperlink to get intent from.
        Returns:
        An intent.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if type of the hyperlink is not HyperlinkType.FROM_INTENT.
        See Also:
        getType(org.netbeans.api.io.Hyperlink), HyperlinkType

      • invoke

        public static void invoke(Hyperlink hyperlink)
        Invoke appropriate action for the hyperlink.
        Parameters:
        hyperlink - Hyperlink to invoke.
